body:
## What happens next ##

We will contact you if we need more details to answer your request.

If you have provided all of the information we need, you should receive a response within 30 days.

components.html: Asking for an update during this time may mean it takes longer to get the information you want.

### After 30 days ###

If you haven't heard from us after 30 days, you can contact: 

#### For requests that included any information from HMPPS: ####

<data.access1@justice.gov.uk>

#### For requests that did not want any information from HMPPS: ####

<data.access@justice.gov.uk>

Tell us your name and the date you made the application.

You should save this page or make a copy for your records.

heading: Request sent
lede: You should receive an acknowledgement in the next 5 working days.
